title: AdS amplitudes as CFT correlators
authors: Maximo Ba\~nados, Ernesto Bianchi, Ivan Mu\~noz, Kostas Skenderis
abstract:
We show that AdS amplitudes are CFT correlators to all orders in the loop
expansion by showing that they obey the conformal Ward identities. In
particular, we provide explicit formulas for the constants and functions of
cross-ratios that determine the CFT correlators in terms of bulk data.
